teacher_info.intro:
¡Hola! My name is Jesús and I'm from Mexico. I've been working as a Spanish teacher for 10 years. I love teaching because it allows me to help and share with others, and also because I can combinate many of my passions, such as literature, travelling, personal growth and  the joy of letting curiosity to drive me in order to learn something new everyday.

Здравствуйте! Меня зовут Хесус. Я из Мексики. Я работаю учителем испанского языка уже 7 лет. Я люблю преподавать, потому что это позволяет мне помогать и делиться с другими людьми тем, что я знаю. Я интересуюсь литературой, личным развитием. Я обожаю путешествовать. С радостью помогу тебе выучить испанский язык!
teacher_info.introduction: My method of teaching is based on a spontaneous communication with my students. From the first lesson, the most important is to learn how to express yourself and feel the Spanish as your own language. It is very interesting and fun! Also, I am very interested in literature, travelling, art, spirituality and in general, in learning something new every new day. Usually my lessons are in Russian, because mostly all my students are from Russia, but I've had students from different parts of the world. So, I can teach without problem in three languages: Spanish, Russian and English. If you speak one of those languages, I think we will find a way to help you in your learning. If you are just starting to learn Spanish, I can help you to start from zero. If you already know it good enough, but you want to practice and improve it, what I offer is lessons of conversation, in which I will not just try to make you corrections so you learn to speak without mistakes and fluently, but also I will try to keep it always interesting, showing you what the Spanish speaker world has to offer you!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I've worked, teaching Spanish to people from the USA, Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Sweden and England. I have experience as a language teacher in official language school. I love to explain and I can say that I am a very patient and flexible teacher.

У меня были ученики из разных стран: России, Украины, Казахстана, Швеции, США и Англии. Также я работал в языковой школе. Я люблю объяснять и я очень терпеливый учитель.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
At the first lesson I always try to understand which are the especific needs of each student. But in general, my method of teaching consists in picking, for example, a grammar topic such as "Future", giving a little introduction of the uses and forms of it, and then starting to guide the person so he starts speaking and writting just as he would do it in real life situations.

I love to explain and I can say that I am a very patient and flexible teacher.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! My name is Tania, I am from Zhytomyr - the city with old history, that was based in year 884. 
I've been singing since I was young, and now I study opera singing, preparing myself for the musical career. I am a passionate language learner and I always seek for effective methods. I passed Goethe-Zertifikat B2 and know planing to start learning Italian. Furthermore, I love to read self-development books and do every day little things to become a better version of myself. During my free time, I like watching some films, anime, Korean dorama, reading Webtoon comics. Also, I play piano and compose some melodies. Besides, in the morning I do yoga and meditation.

teacher_info.about_teacher: For 2 years I was giving Ukrainian and Russian lessons to Chinese students in my Musical Academy in Kyiv. I am pretty sure that the teacher needs to learn together with his/her students. Only then there is a chance to give more service to others. I always try to expand my knowledge in language learning, and I am open to share with my experience in order to help others grow and develop their skills in the target language.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I use the method which calls "The Natural Approach of Language Acquisition" by American linguist Stephen Krashen. It says that we acquire language in the only way, by understanding messages. The key point is to use comprehensible input. With this method, we can acquire the foreign language in the same way as we did with our mother tongue. This method helped me on my language journey.
Also, I can teach you some slang words in Ukrainian, Russian and English.

Have you ever wanted to sing a song in Ukrainian? 
Or maybe you have found a verse, monolog in Ukrainian that you would really like to read in front of the audience? 
Are you a passionate language learner who wants to level up its skills and surprise your friends and family by reading and speaking with no accent in Ukrainian?

If yes, then this lesson is for you! 
We are going to do speech and pronunciation exercises, translation and analysis of your text. Plus, if you want to work with Ukrainian songs, then I have a special lesson offer for you -  I can teach you how correctly to sing phrases in Ukrainian.

Hope to see you soon!

course_info.trial_description:
Здравствуйте! Меня зовут София, я преподаватель русского языка.
Хотите изучать русский язык? Обращайтесь!
Проблемы с произношением? Объясню, отработаем!
Любите петь русские песни? С удовольствием разберем и попоем вместе!
Хотите читать русских поэтов? Не проблема!

pro_course_detail.title: Choose a topic you are interested in, we'll discuss it,  widening  active vocabulary,  idioms and improving your pronunciation.
pro_course_detail.description:
Если вы не уверены в себе, боитесь или стесняетесь  говорить по русски, пишите. Мы обсудим ваши  проблемы, а также   проработаем грамматику, расширим вокабуляр,  выучим новые слова и как их правильно соединить в предложения.  А еще узнаем много нового из истории и культуры России!
Любите петь? Отлично! Я тоже люблю петь русские песни.
Любите поэзию? Почитаем стихи и разберем трудные для понимания места.
Пишите! Договоримся!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian alphabet and letter pronunciation. Cyrillic letters.
pro_course_detail.description:
How do you pronounce the letters in Russian alphabet? What are the letters in the Russian alphabet?
Even if some Russian sounds and letters  look tricky, don't give up!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Names, Nicknames and Diminutives, Forms of Affection. Why must Russian characters have quite so many names
pro_course_detail.description: In Russian culture, names are a big deal. Russian names and surnames are hard to understand for a non-Cyrillic ear just like Cyrillic ABC is hard to understand and remember for an eye accustomed to a language based on the Latin alphabet. Let's look into Russian Naming.

course_info.trial_description: Let 's discuss what your learning goals are . We will also do a practice where you can ask all your questions.

pro_course_detail.title: Basic Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
For those who are starting their way in language learning


Upon completion of this course, you will learn to read, write and understand basic things in Russian

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate level of Russian
pro_course_detail.description: You have been learning Russian for a long time. You understand most of the communication, but it is difficult for you to speak, then this course is for you

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I teach conversational, basic, business Russian and Turkish to foreigners. I have been teaching for nearly 6 years and I’m always searching for beter ways that can help my students to achieve their language goals. I have been teaching Russian and Turkish online and giving private lessons at home.
На моих уроках со студентами я использую современные учебные материалы и методики в соответствии с целью ученика.
Türkçeyi anadili gibi biliyorum ve 6 sene özel ders veriyorum. Oldukça iyi ingilizce de konuşabilirim. Pedagojik üniversitede filolojik fakültesinden mezun oldum.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
We will text, talk in russian or turkish during our lesson, discuss everything in one of these two language. And we are going to learn to listen as well. We are going to listen to different podcast, audiobooks and  we are going to watch some movies- 1 movie a week or episode which we are going to discuss during our lesson.
And of course we are going to learn some grammar. We are not going to devote too much time on grammar( only 5-10% during our lesson) but without grammar we cant go very far.
Мои уроки для учеников пролетают незаметно и увлекательно.
Türkçeyi merak edenlere ve öğrenmek isteyenlere ilk deneme dersimize davet ediyorum. Hoş geldiniz!

course_info.trial_description: On the 1st trial lesson  we will talk about various topics such as travelling, art, music, family, food/cooking, sports, business etc we can even discuss any topic the student wants so i can understand my student's level and his/her main goal for learning.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian!
pro_course_detail.description:
My lessons are very conversational and during each lesson we will practise improving different skills such as reading, writing, listening and speaking. 
I like to use articles, videos, photographs and podcasts during lessons as this is a great way to learn new vocabulary and  to share our thoughts, feelings and opinions on the topic. 

I hope to see you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Turkish!
pro_course_detail.description:
My lessons are very conversational and during each lesson we will practise improving different skills such as reading, writing, listening and speaking.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Beginners, Upper Beginners.
pro_course_detail.description:
During each lesson we will practise improving different skills such as reading, writing, listening and speaking. We can  focus on different grammar points and practise using these in every day situations.  For children i have a very interesting and fun learning plan!
During the lessons, we can focus on anything you would like more practise with or I can plan the lessons for you. 
I hope to see you soon!

teacher_info.intro:
I am a Lomonosov Moscow State University graduate with a degree in teaching Russian as a foreign language. I have been working as a Russian teacher for more than 5 years both in Russia and abroad (e.g. USA, China).  I have experience of teaching Russian at the University as well as a regular language center. 
Apart from teaching, I also love learning foreign languages. I have been learning  English for over 10 years and am able to speak it well. I have some knowledge of German and currently I am studying French. My other hobbies are dancing, hiking and cooking.
teacher_info.short_signature: Native Russian speaker, qualified teacher  with a master's degree and over 5 years of experience
teacher_info.about_me:
I am a Lomonosov Moscow State University graduate with a degree in teaching Russian as a foreign language. I have been working as a Russian teacher for more than 5 years both in Russia and abroad (e.g. USA, China).  I have experience of teaching Russian at the University as well as a regular language center. 
Apart from teaching, I also love learning foreign languages. I have been learning  English for over 10 years and am able to speak it well. I have some knowledge of German and currently I am studying French. My other hobbies are dancing, hiking and cooking.
teacher_info.about_teacher: My students appreciate that I am patient and always to my best to give them clear explanations. I believe that motivation is the driving force of progress. Therefore in order to keep my students motivated I do a thorough job to prepare the content that will be exciting and new for them. Whenever it is needed, I can be either demanding and strict or understanding and merciful.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I love combining different activities in class so we basically do a bit of everything: grammar, reading, listening, speaking, writing and playing games. This helps me keep my students engaged throughout the entire lesson. Apart from textbook, I use other useful resources for learning such as YouTube videos, authentic texts (news, short stories, jokes etc), movies, songs and so on. I strive to create a rich Russian language environment so that my students could immerse into it and enjoy the learning process more.

edu_info.major: Teaching Russian as a Foreign language

course_info.trial_description: In the trial lesson, we can talk about your goals and expectations as well as your preferred methods and content. I usually use some ice-breackers games as a way to get acquainted with new students. If you have studied Russian before, I will suggest we do some more speaking activities so I can detect your level properly. If you are a complete beginner,  we can start with learning some simple basic words land sentences like "Hello!" "How are you?" "My name is..." I can also teach you some Russian letters. By the end of the class, I guarantee you will be able to introduce yourself in Russian as well as read some Russian words!

pro_course_detail.title: Introduction to Russian
pro_course_detail.description: In this course, you will learn how to read in Russian and study the basic grammar concepts like  gender of nouns, verb conjugation etc. We will also work on your listening and speaking skills by listening to and role playing dialogues. At the end of the course, you will be able to handle a short conversation with a native speaker on topics like weather, hobbies and simple dialogues when ordering coffee or buying groceries in a Russian-speaking country.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian through short films
pro_course_detail.description: The class is based on a short film that tells a funny story. Apart from the video content, I also provide worksheets with exercises. The first part of the exercises is meant to help students understand the vocab from the video and review some important grammar aspects. We normally do those before watching the film. The rest of the exercises stimulate the student to speak about his impression and perception of what he saw in the video and share his experience if they have ever happened to be in a similar situation.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description: Learning Russian is not only about learning rules and memorising words. Practicing speaking is a must too if plan on engaging in conversation with a Russian speaker. This class will help beginners  break the language barrier and allow every learner to take their Russian on a new level. The content of the lesson will be picked according with the student's needs and interests. The topics I will be thrilled to discuss include news, history, music, movies, books, travels, technology, sport etc.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian verbs of motion
pro_course_detail.description: In this course, I will teach you the difference between verbs that mean different kinds of motion like идти-ходить, ехать-ездить, лететь-летать etc. I will also cover the most common prefixes that we use with those verbs.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian with Russian movies.
pro_course_detail.description:
In this class, we will watch and discuss Russian movies. Depending on what kind of genre you like, I will give you my suggestions of movies and will let you pick one. I'll design a worksheet with some tasks for you to ensure your better understanding of the main story line and key ideas. Watching movies will help you both boost your language skills and learn the culture.
(All movies I will recommend have English subtitles. Some of them have subtitles in other languages like French, Spanish, Chinese Mandarin, Japanese etc)

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description: In this class, you will learn everyday Russian. The class will include working on all aspects of language: grammar, vocabulary, reading, listening and speaking practice. No matter what your level is - we will start from there!

Я очень добрый и весёлый человек, быстро нахожу общий язык с людьми. Я люблю свой родной язык и помогу тебе полюбить его😏

I am a very kind and cheerful person, I quickly find a common language with people. I love my native language and I will help you to love it too😏
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я не любитель официальной атмосферы, поэтому уроки будут проходить непринужденно и легко. Большой  упор я делаю на разговорную практику, в том числе и постановку произношения. Я сделаю всё, чтобы те, с кем ты разговариваешь не поняли, что русский не твой родной язык!

I am not a fan of the formal atmosphere, so the lessons will take place naturally and easily. I put a lot of emphasis on conversational practice, including pronunciation. I will do everything so that those with whom you are talking do not understand that Russian is not your native language! See you.

course_info.trial_description:
Есть два варианта того, как пройдёт наш первый урок:  урок русского как иностранного с нуля, а если ты уже изучал язык, то мы определим твой уровень и построим стратегию дальнейшего изучения.

The trial lessons were created so that we could get to know each other and understand if I am suitable for you as a teacher. There are two options for how our first lesson will go: a lesson of Russian as a foreign language from scratch, and if you have already studied the language, then we will determine your level and build a strategy for further study.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика | speaking practice
pro_course_detail.description:
During the lessons of speaking practice, we will discuss topics, I will heed you and we will choose topics that are interesting to you. Thus, the main focus will be on working out pronunciation and vocabulary replenishment.
My goal is that no one understands that Russian is not your native language ;)

На уроках разговорной практики мы будем обсуждать те темы, которые интересны тебе.  Таким образом основной фокус будет на проработку произношения и пополнения словарного запаса.
Моя цель - чтобы никто не понял, что русский язык это не твой родной язык.

pro_course_detail.title: General course of Russian language
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of lessons cover all essential elements of language learning: listening, speaking, reading, writing, grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation and also Russian culture. My goal is that no one understands that Russian is not your native language ;)

Этот вид уроков охватывает все основные элементы изучения языка: аудирование, разговорную речь, чтение, письмо, грамматику, наработку словарного запаса, произношение, а также изучение русской культуры.
Моя цель - чтобы никто не понял, что русский язык это не твой родной язык.

pro_course_detail.title: ТРКИ\Test of Russian as a Foreign Language
pro_course_detail.description:
TRKI is an international exam to determine the level of proficiency in the Russian language. General knowledge of Russian as a foreign language includes six levels:

Elementary,
Basic,
I certification,
II certification,
III certification,
IV certification.

The test for each level consists of five components:

🌑Vocabulary. 
🌒Grammar.
🌓Reading
🌔Listening.
🌕Letter.
🌖Speaking.

teacher_info.about_teacher: Мне кажется самый лучший способ выучить язык это учить его с  носителем в непринужденной форме и полностью погрузиться в эту среду. Я как преподаватель стараюсь индивидуально подобрать наиболее удобный формат изучения языка, потому, что все люди разные. Так что моя основная цель быстро обучить вас русскому языку. Поэтому на моих уроках вы не будете скучать.  Мы будем очень много общаться  и учить язык легко и непринужденно. Буду рада встречи с вами на своих уроках!

pro_course_detail.title: РУССКИЙ ЯЗЫК ДЛЯ НОВИЧКОВ
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот урок адресован для начинающих изучение русского языка.  На уроке используется  визуальный материал. Мы будем работать над аудированием и практикой письма,  помогу понять  грамматику..  Уже с первого урока вы сможете легко говорить и понимать элементарные фразы. 
Русский язык и русская культура - это моя страсть. 
The Russian language and Russian culture are my passion. I will help you understand Russian grammar, expand your vocabulary and correct pronunciation mistakes. I am also ready to help develop conversational skills and talk on a wide range of topics.
During the lessons, I take into account the interests and needs of the student.
Жду тебя на своём уроке!

pro_course_detail.title: РАЗГОВОРНАЯ ПРАКТИКА  НА РУСКОМ ЯЗЫКЕ
pro_course_detail.description:
Practicing #Russian first improves your language. It gives you access to more job opportunities. It increases your brain power. It makes traveling easier. It improves your understanding of the world. You experience new cultures. It improves your memory. Also, learning is an achievement in itself. I am waiting for you at my #lessons

Практика русского языка в первую очередь улучшает ваш языковый навык. Это дает вам доступ к большему количеству возможностей трудоустройства. Это увеличивает мощность вашего мозга. Это облегчает путешествие в русскоязычные страны. Это улучшает ваше понимание мира. Вы знакомитесь с новыми культурами. Это улучшает вашу память. Кроме того, обучение само по себе является достижением. Жду вас на своих уроках!

pro_course_detail.title: ЛЮБАЯ ПОМОЩЬ ПО РУССКОМУ ЯЗЫКУ  ANY HELP IN RUSSIAN LANGUAGE
pro_course_detail.description: Помогу в выполнении домашних заданий,  написаний резюме, переводы и любая другая помощь, которая вам потребуется на русском языке.

teacher_info.intro: Hello everyone! I grew up in the south of Siberia in a very small, authentic Russian village. I then moved to Krasnoyarsk, a big city, to study art at university. I am currently working on a children's picture book. I have traveled widely around Russia. I love Russian nature. I have traveled around Europe and the United Kingdom. I was an international volunteer in Belgium and worked in a democratic school there for over 9 months.  I needed to learn French very quickly to communicate with people. It was a tense and challenging experience. I love learning languages and I hope I can share this passion with you!
teacher_info.about_me: Hello everyone! I grew up in the south of Siberia in a very small, authentic Russian village. I then moved to Krasnoyarsk, a big city, to study art at university. I am currently working on a children's picture book. I have traveled widely around Russia. I love Russian nature. I have traveled around Europe and the United Kingdom. I was an international volunteer in Belgium and worked in a democratic school there for over 9 months.  I needed to learn French very quickly to communicate with people. It was a tense and challenging experience. I love learning languages and I hope I can share this passion with you!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have experience teaching Russian as a foreign language. I am in charge of language teaching as part of pre-service training for German youth volunteers coming to Russia. I run lessons for beginners and intermediate learners. I am a flexible, attentive and enthusiastic teacher. I also speak French and passed the DELF B2 exam recently. I always try to help students to understand materials in a way that facilitates long-term memorisation. I am always happy to give extra homework if my students need to consolidate results.
teacher_info.teaching_style: During the first lesson, we will do a few exercices, evaluate your level, and discuss your goals and expectations. I believe that we learn languages to use them in real life. So my lessons focus on practice and immersive learning as much as possible. Even if you are complete beginner, we will try to get speaking and reading regularly, while also learning grammar and vocabulary. I have experienced many sides to Russia, from the small village to the large cities of Krasnoyarsk and St. Petersburg, and I would also love to share this experience with you. I have learned two languages (English and French) from scratch to a B2 level quickly, so I know the processes involved.

course_info.trial_description: The trial lessons is a chance to get to know each other, to discuss your level and objectives in order to start planning your personal learning syllabus. We’ll also get in to the swing of things and start speaking Russian with some games or simple posters or pictures to discuss, depending on your level.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian conversation for everyone!:)
pro_course_detail.description:
Lively conversational lessons to get to grips with everyday Russian language.
Topics can include finding your way through town, useful expressions for getting by, jokes all the way up to more elaborate themes such as nature, art or history. 
Let me know what you are most interested in! We will use texts, pictures and videos as support for our conversations, as well as fun games to sharpen the mind and vocabulary!

PLEASE NOTE!
If you are not able to attend class at programmed time, please let me know in advance (at least in 6 hours). Otherwise, the lesson will be considered as completed and italki credits go to the teacher.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian for B1-C2 levels
pro_course_detail.description:
At that level we will have more difficult topics such as Russian literature, science, music and so on.

Grammar lessons will focus more on the nitty gritty of the Russian language: cases, verb aspects, word order, asking questions, using negations, etc. 

You can let me know what you have particular trouble with or what you want your next step in Russian grammar to be. We will have topics for each lesson as well as grammar, to keep what we learn relevant to the real Russian-speaking world.

PLEASE NOTE!
If you are not able to attend class at programmed time, please let me know in advance (at least in 6 hours). Otherwise, the lesson will be considered as completed and italki credits go to the teacher.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for complete begginers A1-A2
pro_course_detail.description:
This is an educational complex for foreigns who begin to learn Russian from scratch.
We will have 7 thematic blocks:

1. Acquaintance
2. Meet my friend, my family
3. My day
4. City
5. Weekends
6. Healthy lifestyle
7. There is a holiday in the house all year round!

PLEASE NOTE!
If you are not able to attend class at programmed time, please let me know in advance (at least in 6 hours). Otherwise, the lesson will be considered as completed and italki credits go to the teacher.

teacher_info.intro: I used to travel a lot. Met a lot of interesting people in different countries.  I always thought that traveling and studying  are opening the most beautiful sides of our casual life. I have a big family.  I am friendly, smiley , talkative.  I am in love with jogging, skiing and barbecuing, but   life is so much different for us now...

I am in love with jogging, skiing and barbecuing, but   life is so much different for us now...
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a professional school teacher, certified teacher of Russian for foreigners. I teach students who live and work in a different countries and time zones. That's why sometimes my day starts before sun rises. . Very soon I will be ready to teach Ukrainian. I will do my best to find good books or write them myself.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I have been working on-line for over 7 years. I combine study materials and try to make an individual plan for every student. I am punctual, patient and friendly. I love my job. :-)

cert_info.certificate: METHODS OF TEACHING RUSSIAN AS A FOREIGN LANGUAGE

course_info.trial_description: Trial lessons about finding the right person for the long journey of learning foreign language.  Bring your questions,  bring your stories and tell me about your goals. Maybe I am your teacher and you are my student?

pro_course_detail.title: Privet or zdravstvuite?
pro_course_detail.description: If you are beginner I would be happy to support you on the way to speak Russian fluently and if you are on upper intermediate level i will create challenges ;-)  for you to move on. I work on-line for over 7 years. I combine study materials and try to make an individual plan for every student.

pro_course_detail.title: No books or exercises ! Let's chat!
pro_course_detail.description: Я уверена, что я хороший собеседник! Предлагаю разговорную практику для студентов, которые изучают русский язык. На занятии мы обсуждаем интересные статьи, фильмы, книги, события в мире, спрашиваем или даём советы. Интересно?/ I offer speaking practice for students who study Russian. At the lessons we discuss interesting articles, films, books, news, will give or ask for advice. Interested ?

pro_course_detail.title: Grammar, grammar and .... grammar!!!!
pro_course_detail.description: If you study or already speak  Russian and you still  have any questions about Russian grammar then you could bring all  your questions to this class where we discover how it works and why it is so.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian on Saturday or Sunday
pro_course_detail.description: I would be glad to have lessons on Saturday/Sunday!  Don't be surprised I also have my personal reasons to work on weekend.  :-) And what plans do you have on Saturday /Sunday? (to book a lesson on Saturday or Sunday  please first contact me) .

teacher_info.intro: Hey alle zusammen! Ich heiße Komila und bin 23 Jahre alt. Ich bin in Taschkent geboren und in Berlin aufgewachsen. Zur Zeit studiere ich Medizin in Rostock, im Norden von Deutschland. Vor kurzem habe ich  Italki für mich entdeckt und habe selbst ein paar Lernstunden English und Schwedisch genommen.
teacher_info.about_me: Hey alle zusammen! Ich heiße Komila und bin 23 Jahre alt. Ich bin in Taschkent geboren und in Berlin aufgewachsen. Zur Zeit studiere ich Medizin in Rostock, im Norden von Deutschland. Vor kurzem habe ich  Italki für mich entdeckt und habe selbst ein paar Lernstunden English und Schwedisch genommen.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Als Lehrkraft möchte ich auf Italki dir helfen deine Deutschkenntnisse zu verbessern, Spaß am Sprachenlernen vermitteln und selbst Lehrerfahrung sammeln. Wenn du auch wie ich im Gesundheitsbereich tätig bist, würde ich dir auch ein fachbezogenes Sprachtraining anbieten.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Ich selber lerne Fremdsprachen gerne durch das Reden und Hören. Ein aktiver Gebrauch der Sprache hält sie am Leben. Deshalb möchte ich in den Lehrstunden besonders dein Sprechen fördern und deine Selbstsicherheit im Sprachgebrauch steigern.  Dafür können wir über unterschiedlichsten Themen sprechen, die von mir angeboten, oder auch von dir ganz frei gewählt werden können. Ein angenehme Atmosphäre und entspanntes Reden finde ich für das Sprachenlernen wichtig

course_info.trial_description: Den Probeunterricht nutze ich gerne für das Kennenlernen und die Planung weiterer Stunden. Je nach deinen Wünschen passe ich die Stunde individuell an dich an und gebe mein Bestes um dir den Spaß an der Sprache zu vermitteln!

pro_course_detail.title: Russisch Basics
pro_course_detail.description: In dieser Unterrichtsstunde können wir die freie Gesprächsführung üben. Dabei arbeiten wir an deiner Aussprache, Grammatik und erlernen neue Inhalte. Bei Wunsch können wir das Leseverstehen und das freie Schreiben trainieren. Unterrichtsmaterialien sind erstmal  nicht geplant. Wir können uns aber im Verlauf auf bestimmte Quellen einigen

pro_course_detail.title: Deutsch, Fachunterricht
pro_course_detail.description:
Dieser Unterricht ist für jeden gedacht, der im Gesundheitsbereich tätig ist und sein Deutsch verbessern möchte. Wir üben gemeinsam die Anamneseerhebung, Patientenvorstellung und anderes. Bitte schreib mir vor dem Unterricht welche Erwartungen du an die Unterrichtsstunde hast, damit ich die Stunde individuell an dich anpassen kann. 
Danke, dass du Interesse an meinem Unterricht zeigst, ich freue mich auf dich!

pro_course_detail.title: Deutsch
pro_course_detail.description:
Diese Unterrichtsstunde ist für Anfänger und Fortgeschrittene gemeint.  Hier können wir z.B. die im Alltag häufig vorkommenden Gespräche üben. Dabei üben wir gezielt (je nach deinem Wunsch) die Aussprache, die Grammatik oder Gesprächsführung zu ausgewählten Themen. Gerne kannst du mir deine persönlichen Interessengebiete und die Vorstellungen zum Unterricht vorher mitteilen, sodass wir die Stunde so gut es geht nutzen können. Danke, dass du Interesse an meinem Unterricht hast! 

Kein medizinbezogenes Fachunterricht

teacher_info.intro: Hello! My name is Ekaterina. I'm from Moscow, Russia. I have a strange mixture of interests: medicine, pole dance and, of course, Russian language. I'm here to share the last one with you!
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! My name is Ekaterina. I'm from Moscow, Russia. I have a strange mixture of interests: medicine, pole dance and, of course, Russian language. I'm here to share the last one with you!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I love to talk with people, who learn Russian, because I'm sure that there are no boring, uninteresting or lazy among them. This my desire is so great, that I received additional education as a teacher of Russian as a foreign language. I want to share my knowledge with you
teacher_info.teaching_style: I believe that the most effective way for students to use italki lessons is to speake as much as possible. Of course, the content of the lesson primarily depends on your goals in learning the language. So first of all I will ask you to tell me about them. Then we will talk about the chosen topic. I will help you with vocabulary, pronunciation and grammar.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners A1-A2

Grammar, pronunciation, listening skills

I prepare the material thoroughly. I try to make my classes interesting and varied. Your progress is very important to me.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Непринужденная обстановка. Материал подбирается индивидуально в соответствии с Вашими предпочтениями. Мы будем использовать в наших занятиях не только учебники, но и просмотр разнообразных видео на youtube, слушать музыку, описывать происходящее на картинке и многое другое.
Relaxed atmosphere. The material is selected individually according to your preferences. We will use in our classes not only textbooks, but also watching various videos on youtube, listening to music, describing what is happening in the picture and much more. It can be General or Aviation English.

course_info.trial_description:
На пробном уроке мы получше познакомимся и вы сможете рассказать о ваших предпочтениях и целях. Это поможет мне подготовить материалы для последующих уроков.
In a trial lesson, we will get to know each other better and you will be able to talk about your preferences and goals. This will help me prepare materials for subsequent lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: General English,  Job Interview, Aviation English ///  Общий английский, Подготовка к собеседованию, Авиационный английский
pro_course_detail.description:
В этом курсе мы изучим основные времена и пополним словарный запас. Научимся вести диалог. На занятиях мы будем читать книги и тексты, смотреть/слушать записи (видео, песни, аудио записи) на разные темы.
Данный курс содержит все четыре аспекта изучения иностранного языка: чтение, письмо, аудирование и говорение.
In this course, we will explore basic tenses, build vocabulary and learn how to conduct a dialogue. We will read books and texts, watch/listen recordings (videos, songs, audio recordings) on various topics.
This course contains all four aspects of learning a foreign language: reading, writing, listening and speaking.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык для любого уровня A1-C2 / Russian for any level A1-C2
pro_course_detail.description:
На наших занятиях мы можем разговаривать с Вами на любые темы. Будем описывать картинки, читать и обсуждать тексты/новости. Так же по желанию будем использовать интересный учебник.
In our classes we can talk with you on any topic. We will describe pictures, read and discuss texts/news. Also, if desired, we will use an interesting textbook.

pro_course_detail.title: Discounts for old students and for new students with a class 3 times a week
pro_course_detail.description: Discounts for old students and for students who book a class 3 times a week

teacher_info.intro: If you want to learn to speak Russian or English I can help you! My experience in teaching allows me to make creative and fun lessons. We can work specifically with pronunciation, or with grammar, or with vocabulary, or anything that you really need.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hi, I'm Anna.
* I'm a certified teacher of Russian and English as second languages.
*I have a masters degree and 10 years of off-line experience. I've been teaching on-line since 2013.
*I love teaching! I think it is fun. Though Russian is a very difficult language I'm sure it is interesting to learn it. Trust me after each lesson you'll see the improvements and you won't be afraid of speaking this beautiful language.
* I use communicative approach, but with beginners I work through the basics thoroughly. I present the material according to the communicative needs, but with carefully dosed portions. Even a beginner can interact with real Russian.
* With low-intermediate and advanced students we will practice specific grammar points in an engaging and natural way through conversational patterns and games.
teacher_info.about_me: If you want to learn to speak Russian or English I can help you! My experience in teaching allows me to make creative and fun lessons. We can work specifically with pronunciation, or with grammar, or with vocabulary, or anything that you really need.

edu_info.major: teaching English as a foreign language

cert_info.description:
Participation in online course for teachers of Russian as a foreign language. The program of the course includes methodical webinars:
1. Role of grammar in the communicative course of Russian as a foreign language. 
2. Methods of motivation learning Russian grammar. 
3. Necessary things about practical Russian grammar that you should know before entering the class. 
4. Passing from listening learning texts to understanding spoken language.

cert_info.certificate: teaching Russian as a foreign language

pro_course_detail.title: Russian speaking practice
pro_course_detail.description: If you're a bit tired of studying grammar or reading and answering questions, this is the lesson to book. Sometimes we all just need to feel the flow of a real conversation. Isn't it the reason why we all want to know a foreign language? I'm open to discuss any topics (even politics))) and help you with any vocabulary that you really need to express your opinion or ask for mine.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Everything you need to start speaking, reading and writing Russian:
*Russian alphabet
*Pronunciation
*Reading rules
*Grammar: cases, verbs conjugation

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for intermediate and advanced students
pro_course_detail.description:
The course includes a lot of speaking practice in focused conversations. The main aim is your feeling confident in using cases and conjugation of verbs together with increasing your vocabulary. 
With advanced students we'll use a special method of speech development based on reading works of literature, listening to modern Russian songs and watching modern Russian films.

pro_course_detail.title: English (all levels)
pro_course_detail.description: This course is for any level of English: from beginner to advanced. This course can make you move forward with your speaking skills with the help of grammar and developing your listening abilities.

Я обучаю более 20 лет.  
Я уверен, что понимание как мыслит собеседник, в чем он нуждается,  это ключ к эффективному обучению языку.
I have been teaching for over 20 years.
I am sure that understanding how the interlocutor thinks, what he needs, is the key to effective language learning.
Saya mengajar sudah lebih dari 20 tahun.
Saya yakin, bahwa pemahaman pikiran dan kebutuhan orang lain adalah kunci dari pengajaran yang efektif.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
У любого обучения должна быть цель, поэтому перед занятием мы с учеником ставим задачи которые помогут достичь целей и удовлетворить потребности учащегося.
Я всегда приспосабливаю материал и методы обучения под каждого ученика.
Semua hal harus ada tujuan. Maka, kita pikirkan dulu apa yang akan bantu untuk memenuhi kebutuhan dan mencapai tujuan siswa.
Saya selalu sesuaikan bahan dan metode pengajaran untuk setiap siswa.

course_info.trial_description:
Давайте познакомимся.  / Let's get acquainted.
 Определим цели и задачи. / Let's define the goals and objectives.
Решим как достичь целей и составим план дейстивий.  / We will decide how to achieve the goals and draw up an action plan.
Ставка на результат. / Betting on the result.

pro_course_detail.title: разговорная практика / speaking practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Хотите достичь своих целей? / Want to reach your goals?
 Никаких скучных уроков, только то, что нужно!  / No boring lessons, just what you need!
Практика, максимально близкая к реальным задачам, и Вы будете говорить свободно.  /
Practice as close to real-world problems as possible and you will be fluent.
Я научу тебя своим действенным методам. / I will teach you my effective methods.
Но прийдется испытать стресс... Готов? Поехали!   / But you have to experience the stress ... Ready?   Go!!!
In these lessons we are going to focus on improving your speaking skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice / Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
In these lessons we are going to focus on improving your speaking skills. Whether there's any particular topic that you'd like to practice or you just want to get close to speaking fluently - this is the exact lesson for you!
В этих уроках мы сосредоточимся на улучшении ваших разговорных навыков. Независимо от того, есть ли какая-то конкретная тема, которую вы хотели бы практиковать, или вы просто хотите приблизиться к беглой речи - это точный урок для вас!

pro_course_detail.title: belajar bahasa Rusia dari pemula sampai lancar!
pro_course_detail.description:
Khususnya orang indonesia yang sama sekali tidak bisa bahasa rusia dan merasa tidak mampu belajar, saya akan meyakinkan Anda untuk berhasil! Pasti akan bisa! 
Ada beberapa rahasia untuk belajar dengan cepat dan saya berbagi pengalaman saya pribadi.
1. Kita memastikan tujuan dan niat.
2. Kita memilih metode dan bahan pelajaran.
3.  Kita sepakati jadwal yang cocok.
Masih banyak langkah yang perlu dilakukan sampai sukses, tapi pasti bisa dengan saya!

pro_course_detail.title: Индонезийский язык для русскоговорящих. Практические уроки. Особенности культуры общения.
pro_course_detail.description:
Если вы хотите освоить новый язык и познакомится с интересной культурой, я с радостья поделюсь своим восьмилетним опытом общения с индонезийцами.
Я свободно говорю и пишу на официальном индонезийском, т.к. много читаю и постоянно общаюсь с местными.  Иногда при разговоре по телефону меня спрашивают, с какого я острова с таким старнным акцентом )) (в каждой территоии есть свой акцент, т.к. большинство индонезийцев говорять на своём местном языке абслютно отличающемся от государственного).

pro_course_detail.title: Консультации по поездке, переезду, ведению бизнеса, инвестиций в Индонезии. Основные слова и важные манеры для комуникации. Особенности менталитета.
pro_course_detail.description:
С 2013 года я с семьёй живу на райском острове Бали.
Адаптация в чужой стране стоила нам довольно дорого, а незнание простых вещей достовляло трудности. 
За 8 лет мы приобрели очень ценный опыт решения множества бытовых вопросов. Наши знания языка внутренней жизни на острове позволяют нам получать лучшее соотношение цены и качества при текущих расходах и крупных покупках.
Сейчас я изучаю различные объекты недвижимости выгодные для инвестиций, а так же у меня есть опыт ведения бизнеса на Бали.  
Я буду очень рад поделиться с Вами всеми этими знаниями.

I am educated in economics as well as I have professional diplomas in Teaching, Marketing and Finance. 
I really enjoy traveling. I have been in 27 countries. Maybe you are also a traveling lover? We can exchange our experience!
Whatever you are interested in we will find common topics for discussion!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I start with finding out of your learning motivation and help you to keep it going during all my classes. 
Your language progress is my goal! 
As well as I strongly believe in the clear structure of learning process. It will give you great results!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I prepare all lessons for every my student individually. Because every student has his own personality, temperament and level of knowledge. 
Although I have a lot of practical tips, exersises and methods of remembering, the personal approach gives the best results.

I try to find the topics that will be interesting for you. I will give you an acceleration in your learning process.
We will practice all your skills including speaking, listening, writing and reading or we can make an accent on your vocabulary and communication skills only!

course_info.trial_description: During the lesson we will find out your main purpose for learning Russian and create the best scenario how you can achieve it!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian from zero till advanced. Russian grammar
pro_course_detail.description:
Всем привет!
Hello everyone! 
你好!

This course consist of the following parts:
- General Russian (where we will learn the language gradually based on your interests. We will focus on improving your vocabulary + grammar norms +listening + speaking)
- Conversation Russian (we will focus on your conversation skill + vocabulary + pronanciation)
- As a benifit: Business Russian (I graduated in business and worked in business field. It helps me to create for you the set of Russian lessons with all necessery cases in real life)

Whatever is your goal we will focus on achieving it together!

pro_course_detail.description:
Вiтаю, сябры!
Hello everyone!

In this course we will go through Belarusian language from zero to advanced. 

This course includes:

2. Thematic topics for expending your Belarussian vocabulary

Book your trial lesson to expand your knowleadge of a Slavic language family.

pro_course_detail.title: 20-hours Speaking Course. TRKI vocabulary.
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello everyone!

About the course

This course contains 20 structured and chained lessons of speaking practice.
Lessons are built in accordance with official TRKI program. They includes required TRKI vocabulary based on your Russian level.

For whom

This course is for you if you worked with grammar before. Your current goal is to revise the Russian grammar and work on your passive vocabulary turning it into the active one.
You can also choose your level: A2, B1, B2	
			
The lessons structure

Topic for practice
Intensive exercises for speaking practice
Pronunciation setting
Homework (for your choice) 

If you want to know more please choose the 30-minutes trial lesson or text me in direct. 
See you soon!
